name: image-stacker
title: Image Stacker
content:
Overview

This application stacks multiple images (2-4) vertically or horizontally into a single combined image. Built using Pillow, it automatically handles alignment and sizing.

Features

  • Stack 2-4 images in vertical or horizontal layout
  • Automatic centering and alignment
  • Handles different image sizes
  • High-quality output

Parameters

  • Image 1-4: Upload 2-4 images from stash
  • Stack Direction: Choose vertical or horizontal stacking
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a stacked image named stacked_[direction]_[count]_images.jpg in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Creating before/after comparisons
  • Building photo strips or panels
  • Combining related images for presentations
  • Creating comparison grids
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$RANDOM_$$RANDOM"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/image_stacker.py" "${image1}" "${image2}" "${image3}" "${image4}" -o "${outputDir}" -d "${direction}"
